fields.name: Passives:
fields.value: - Relish the Hunt: Directly Attacking the same player with 3 Attacking cards in a phase causes you to play a Heal! on yourself. Multi-use (Upgraded) attacks do not count.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Bloodhunt: Pick a player. If they have attacked this phase, Attack! them immediately. [2 uses, 1 CD]  
- Frenzy: Apply (Upgraded) to an Attacking card in your Hand. [2 uses, 4 CD, Unique, Unlocks D2] 
- Takedown: Pick a player. Deal 2 HP Unblockable damage at the end of the phase. [1 use, Unique, Night-Only, Unlocks N2]
- Roar: Change a card in your Hand into a non-Special Attacking card of your choice. Gains a use every 3 players you outlive. [1 use, Recharging, 0/3]
